org.frutilla.annotations

Annotation Type Frutilla


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Documented
public @interface Frutilla
    Describes a test using sentences in plain text, similar to Cucumber.
    This description is included in many places:
    • the stacktrace of the failed tests
    • the javadocs
    • the logs in the console

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] Given
      Describes the entry point of the use case.
      java.lang.String[] Then
      Describes what is the expected behavior after doing the main action.
      java.lang.String[] When
      Describes what the use case does, the main action of the use case.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String Scenario 

    • Element Detail

      • Given

        public abstract java.lang.String[] Given
        Describes the entry point of the use case.
        Returns:
        a sentence or group of sentences

      • When

        public abstract java.lang.String[] When
        Describes what the use case does, the main action of the use case.
        Returns:
        a sentence or group of sentences

      • Then

        public abstract java.lang.String[] Then
        Describes what is the expected behavior after doing the main action.
        Returns:
        a sentence or group of sentences

      • Scenario

        public abstract java.lang.String Scenario
        Default:
        ""
